Detailed Description

Some generic functions used by HttpParserThread and possibly others.

void HttpParserThreadUtility::charsetToMC2 (  MC2String &  str,
const char *  charset
)  [static]
 

Transforms str to MC2.

Supports UTF-8. ISO-8859-1, ASCII first 256 chars in UNINCODE is the same so they are all ok too.
